contents.name: FilterForge
contents.description: A plugin for Adobe Photoshop that allows you to build your own filters.

contents.name: Live Normal
contents.description: An Android and iOS app for generating seamless materials on the go. You take a photo, and Live Normal creates a tile-able texture and generates texture maps ready for a PBR engine of your choice.

contents.name: PixPlant
contents.description: PixPlant is a smart 3D texturing tool that creates high quality normal, displacement, specular maps and seamless textures from photos.
